name: fantasy-pl
description: Give your coding agent direct access to up-to date Fantasy Premier League data

prompts.name: Compare Players
prompts.description: This example shows how to compare the statistics of two players.
prompts.text: Compare Mohamed Salah and Erling Haaland over the last 5 gameweeks.

prompts.name: Find Players
prompts.description: This example demonstrates how to find players of a specific team.

prompts.name: Current Gameweek Status
prompts.description: This example prompts for the current gameweek status.

prompts.name: Top Forwards
prompts.description: This example retrieves the top 5 forwards by points.
prompts.text: Show me the top 5 forwards by points.
